name: Fully Furnished
description:
In Fully Furnished, you tell a group of furniture when the right time to scare is. But is there more to "life" than scaring?

If you pay $0.99 or more then you can download all five of the in development builds, from gray box to what you see today, as well as read my developer commentary that includes all of my thoughts and feelings on the game.

This game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 33 using the theme "You Are The Monster." Voted #38 in Innovation(Jam)!
